articles.author: Saumya Nigam
articles.title: Milky Way's heaviest known black hole discovered by astronomers - India TV News
articles.description: An international space research team has discovered the black hole while analyzing the most recent data captured by the European Space Agency's Gaia space telescope, as stated by Israel's Tel Aviv University (TAU).
articles.content:
Astronomers have reportedly found BH3, which is by far said to be the heaviest known stellar black hole in the Milky Way galaxy. It is further said to be 33 times the mass of the Sun. 
It was an int… [+1751 chars]
